languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас хмурится, сжимает обгоревшие губы и опускает взгляд.{/n} "И все же... и все же я подвел вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас хмурится, сжимает обгоревшие губы и опускает взгляд.{/n} "И все же... и все же я подвел вас".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас хмурится, сжимает обгоревшие губы и опускает взгляд.{/n} "И все же... и все же я подвел вас".

{n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは眉をひそめ、焼けた唇をつぐんで視線を落とした。{/n}「なのに…あなたの期待に応えられませんでした」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは眉をひそめ、焼けた唇をつぐんで視線を落とした。{/n}「なのに…あなたの期待に応えられませんでした」

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯皱着眉头，垂下头，抿紧了灼伤的嘴唇。{/n}“即便如此……我还是让您失望了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯皱着眉头，垂下头，抿紧了灼伤的嘴唇。{/n}“即便如此……我还是让您失望了。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas frunce el ceño, aprieta los labios y baja la mirada.{/n} «A pesar... a pesar de eso, sigo habiendo fallado».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas frunce el ceño, aprieta los labios y baja la mirada.{/n} «A pesar... a pesar de eso, sigo habiendo fallado».

languages.text: {n}Achilleas fronce les sourcils, pince ses lèvres brûlées et baisse les yeux.{/n} « Et pourtant... j'ai manqué à mon devoir envers vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas fronce les sourcils, pince ses lèvres brûlées et baisse les yeux.{/n} « Et pourtant... j'ai manqué à mon devoir envers vous. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas verzieht das Gesicht, presst seine verbrannten Lippen zusammen und senkt den Blick.{/n} "Und dennoch ... dennoch habe ich Euch enttäuscht."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas verzieht das Gesicht, presst seine verbrannten Lippen zusammen und senkt den Blick.{/n} "Und dennoch ... dennoch habe ich Euch enttäuscht."

languages.text: {n}Yüzü düşen Achilleas, yanık dudaklarını bastırıp başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Yine de... Yine de sizi yüzüstü bıraktım."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas frowns, presses his burnt lips together, and drops his gaze.{/n} "And yet... And yet I still failed you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzü düşen Achilleas, yanık dudaklarını bastırıp başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Yine de... Yine de sizi yüzüstü bıraktım."
